titleStmt.title: The Leviathan heretical, or, The charge exhibited in Parliament against M. Hobbs justified by the refutation of a book of his entituled The historical narration of heresie and the punishments thereof by John Dowel.
titleStmt.author: Dowell, John, ca. 1627-1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by L. Lichfield and are to be sold by A. Stephens,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Cambridge University.
